detail_desc: High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly with a button, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. The shorts are made partly from recycled cotton.
Small metal hair clips in various glittery and shimmering designs. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Small metal hair clips in various glittery and shimmering designs. Length of hair clips 4 cm.

Short blouse in a crisp cotton weave with a round neckline and short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Covered buttons down the back and narrow elastication at the hem.
Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a faceted button at the top. Patterned lining.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.

Baseball jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood in jersey. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps, opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads and an elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Playsuit in jersey with a square neckline and scallop-edged flounces in a cotton broderie anglaise weave at the top and hems. Elasticated seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cropped zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Boxy style with low-dropped shoulders, long wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.

Rain jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Small, rectangular shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and a flap with a concealed, magnetic press-stud fastener. Imitation suede lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 22 cm.

Skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Seam just above the knee and a flared flounce to the hem. Long at the back and slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.

Fully lined swimsuit with a cut-out section at each side and a partially open back. Shoulder straps that join to form a racer back, and medium coverage at the back.

Fully lined bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and practical zip at the front that is closed by pulling the tab upwards. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, a racer back and a wide trim at the hem in elastic with a sheen.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.

Wide Alice band covered in glossy jersey with studs. Embroidered trim on the inside.

Short, A-line dress in a woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Hole-patterned, scalloped trims around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
